solution_line_template: Multiplying both sides of the equation by {fraction_multiplier_numerator}/{fraction_multiplier_denominator} gives b = ({fraction_multiplier_numerator}/{fraction_multiplier_denominator})*{deaf_students} = <<({fraction_multiplier_numerator}/{fraction_multiplier_denominator})*{deaf_students}={blind_students}>>{blind_students}
The total number of students is {deaf_students} + {blind_students} = <<{deaf_students}+{blind_students}={total_students}>>{total_students}
